sentences.en: Discourse analysis and ethnography of communication are two important angles of anthropological linguistics.
sentences.cn: 话语分析和交际民族志是语言人类学研究的两个重要视角.

sentences.en: So, personally, I think accurate ethnography should still be the necessary subject of anthropology.
sentences.cn: 因此, 精细的民族志仍然应该是人类学的重点产品.

sentences.en: The educational ethnography is an transdisciplinary application of the ethnography ( as a method ) by the educational researchers.
sentences.cn: 教育民族志是教育研究者对“民族志”这一研究方法的跨 学科 应用.

words.tran_cn: 人种志学者；民族志学者

trans.tran_en: the scientific description of different races of people
